title: alibitress
author: alibitress
content: Hello guys,I'm a crypto trader, and I always wanted to shop with crypto online, unfortunately not many sites are accepting crypto as payment method.After working for  almost 10 months, I created a website using AliExpress product database, which has almost 15+ million products, and auto updating according to AliExpress Database.Customer can shop with Bitcoin and other 150+ cryptocurrencies without converting their crypto assets to the Fiat.Website URL: https://www.alibitress.com/All suggestions are welcomed.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: alibitress on November 07, 2022, 07:53:25 PMAfter working for  almost 10 months, I created a website using AliExpress product database, which has almost 15+ million products, and auto updating according to AliExpress Database.Customer can shop with Bitcoin and other 150+ cryptocurrencies without converting their crypto assets to the Fiat.LOL... You totally cloned AliExpress website and even all articles and sellers from that website are also available on your website.I don't see Bitcoin or crypto mentioned anywhere on website, on payment methods page it shows that you only accept card payments, and this looks very suspicious to me.Accepting Bitcoin claims are misleading, and this could be just one more phishing website.Archive:http://web.archive.org/web/20221107203247/https://www.alibitress.com/

comments.author: alibitress
comments.body: It's in every product title, mate.Also try to place order.I will also write and put logos of accepted currencies.It's in Beta, so suggestions are always good.Thanks

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.created_time: November 08, 2022, 10:37:50 PMLast edit: November 08, 2022, 10:49:57 PM by dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: alibitress on November 07, 2022, 11:33:35 PMIt's in every product title, mate.I don't know what exactly you mean with this, so you could explain in better?What happens is someone already have registered AliExpress account?Quote from: alibitress on November 07, 2022, 11:33:35 PMAlso try to place order.I will also write and put logos of accepted currencies.It's in Beta, so suggestions are always good.For creating orders I would need to create new account, and I don't feel safe writing my private details (including phone number and address) in some shady cloned website in beta phase.Adding logos and text changes won't fix anything, and I didn't see any proof that you are really delivering anything from sellers.You didn't explain how payments work, and until them I will consider your website high risk and potential scam. EDIT:For transparency reasons, I created test dummy account and at checkout page there is option for paying with Bitcoin and other 150 cryptocurrencies, using NOWpayments.I can't verify if this actually works, and if items would be shipped to person who made an order.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: So how does it work from your side? It is clear that you're not a seller here and don't have a full guarantee of the condition of the product sent. Just wondering how to resolve the dispute between the customer and the genuine seller. Or how to make sure that you order the product from the merchant I'm interested in from the AliExpress website, not from another merchant (bts)?

comments.author: alibitress
comments.body: This website is not affiliated with AliExpress, it's totally independent website, but it's contains all the product that AliExpress have in stock.If customer place an order on AliBitress, and pay via Bitcoin or other cryptocurrency, Order will be paid by AliBitress, and all the order responsibility including shipping, quality, etc, will be handled by AliBitress.Quote from: dkbit98 on November 08, 2022, 10:37:50 PMQuote from: alibitress on November 07, 2022, 11:33:35 PMIt's in every product title, mate.I don't know what exactly you mean with this, so you could explain in better?What happens is someone already have registered AliExpress account?Quote from: alibitress on November 07, 2022, 11:33:35 PMAlso try to place order.I will also write and put logos of accepted currencies.It's in Beta, so suggestions are always good.For creating orders I would need to create new account, and I don't feel safe writing my private details (including phone number and address) in some shady cloned website in beta phase.Adding logos and text changes won't fix anything, and I didn't see any proof that you are really delivering anything from sellers.You didn't explain how payments work, and until them I will consider your website high risk and potential scam. EDIT:For transparency reasons, I created test dummy account and at checkout page there is option for paying with Bitcoin and other 150 cryptocurrencies, using NOWpayments.I can't verify if this actually works, and if items would be shipped to person who made an order.https://i.imgur.com/xJoZ9mZ.jpg

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.created_time: November 13, 2022, 10:50:05 AMLast edit: November 13, 2022, 01:24:51 PM by OmegaStarScream
comments.body: I have a few questions, and suggestions...What you want to do instead of using AliExpress design, is to make your own and allow users to lookup for goods from AliExpress (API?) because the current design shouts "phishing attempt" whether that's your intention or not.You said all the order responsibility is handled by you. Does that mean you will act as a package forwarder? Meaning the item goes from AliExpress -> your address -> to the client's address? Wouldn't that take a longer time?

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: alibitress on November 07, 2022, 07:53:25 PMWebsite URL: https://www.alibitress.com/Hey alibitress.Is your service still working and operational or not?Website was online few days ago, but purchasing of stuff was not possible because of maintenance work.Today I can't even open your website, and it's not only me who has the problem:https://www.isitdownrightnow.com/alibitress.com.html

comments.author: alibitress
comments.body: It's working, it was probably down for maintenance.
